p: Flu is, of course, a completely new and different disease each and every year. The Seattle-based Institute for Health Metrics and Evaluation (IHME), in its latest estimates, predicted that the number of people who may die from COVID-19 in most countries by autumn 2020 is comparable to severe flu, assuming that anti/epidemic measures against COVID-19 have taken place [ 24]. The peak of the epidemic wave in terms of deaths in many European countries was scheduled for mid-April, and that was exactly what has been witnessed.
